TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PSDataTable extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains methods that help to extract values from a DataRow object.

Docs.param: The row to search for the specified column.
The name of the column.
Docs.summary: Gets a DataRow object that contains only the specified column.
Docs.returns: A DataRow object that contains only the specified column. If either or are a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), it returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Docs.summary: Gets the Boolean value of the specified column in a DataRow object.
Docs.returns: Returns the Boolean value of the specified column. If either or are a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), it returns false.

remarks.para: Internally, GetColumnAsBoolean(row, colName) calls GetColumnAsBoolean(row, colName, false).
